Key Match Events: Giannis Antetokounmpo was called for a foul on Hornets guard LaMelo Ball, which led to Ball making two free throws and taking the lead.
Antetokounmpo eventually missed a potential game-winning jumper.
Post-Match Reflections: After the game crew chief Curtis Blair acknowledged that the leg-to-leg contact foul called on Antetokounmpo was incorrect.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Bucks lost to the Charlotte Hornets 115-114.
Others: The Bucks' loss was the result of a controversial call on a foul against Giannis Antetokounmpo, which was later deemed incorrect by the referees.
